summary: MY STEERING WHEEL HAS BEEN MAKING A CRUNCHING NOISE.  WHILE DRIVING ON THE INTERSTATE, I GOT OFF AT AN EXIT TO PURCHASE FOOD.  WHILE TURNING INTO A PARKING LOT, ONE LOUD CRUNCH NOISE HAPPENED AND THE DRIVERS SIDE AIRBAG LIGHT CAME ON.  I ALSO NOTICED THAT I LOST ALL ELECTRONIC FUNCTIONS IN THE STEERING WHEEL.  I WAS VERY CONCERNED SINCE I STILL HAD AN HOURS DRIVE HOME AND WAS UNSURE IF THE CAR WAS SAFE OR NOT.
